name: Fancy Nancy Dress
description:
(Please note larger sizes require some measurements)

This dress is based off of Jane O'Connor and Robin Preiss Glasser's children's book character. This Fancy Nancy party dress is perfect for your little book lover. This fully lined dress is perfect for play with it's professionally finished seams and complete washability.



● Sizing ● 

Please send me the following measurements of your little one to insure proper fit. 

Chest (around)
Bodice (from the shoulder to where the skirt should start)
Skirt (from the empire waist to where you want it to end)

If you are giving this as a gift and don't have access to your little one I can make this based off of some standard measurements up to size 6T but I do prefer using measurements to ensure proper fit it is best to send me measurements.

● Shipping ● 
Please allow 2 weeks for your order to be custom made before shipment.

All my items come tied with a bow, if you would like to include a little gift note just let me know in the messages to sellers when you check out.

name: Solid Bloomers (any color of the rainbow available )
description:
1 Pair of bloomers

Have you inherited an adorable outfit but the bottoms or missing? Do you have adorable dresses that just long to be completed with cute little bottoms? Or do you just want a few solid colored blommers to throw over onsies and baby legs? Well just tell me what color/shade you'd like and I'll make you a pair of bloomers. The bloomers easy to wear and easy to wash and oh so cute with their subtle ruffles around the leg.

(The bloomers in the first picture were made with the request of a light, medium and hot pink colored bloomers)

Please specify size and color at checkout. 

0-3 months (waist 18") 
3-6 months (waist 19") 
6-12 months (waist 20") 
12-24 months (waist 21") 
2T (waist 22") 
3T (waist 22")

The measurements are of the unstretched elastic. I can easily adjust the length of elastic to suit your little one just let me know at checkout.

Please allow 1-2 weeks for your bloomers to be made before shipment.

name: Solid Ruffle Bums or diaper covers (any color of the rainbow)
description:
1 Pair of stand alone ruffle bums

These are the cutest little diaper covers adorned with lace right across the bum (or if you prefer they can be made for boys or girls without the eyelet). Perfect for completing that adorable inherited outfit that was missing it's bottoms or pairing with the cutest dresses that just long to be completed with little bottoms. They are just as adorable on their own paired with a little onesie or sassy top. Just tell me what color/shade you'd like and I'll make you a pair of ruffle bums to suit your needs.

Please specify size and color at checkout. If you would like these without the lace just make a note of that when you check out with paypal. 

0-3 months 
3-6 months 
6-12 months 
12-24 months 
2T 
3T 

Please allow 1-2 weeks for your bloomers to be made before shipment.

name: Birch Blossoms - Peek-a-boo Dress
description:
● Peek-a-boo Dress ●

Introducing the adorable peek-a-boo dress with pleat detailing at the neck and the peek-a-boo heirlooming at the hem of the skirt (the rick-rack acts as a little window, it is not simply sewn on top like you usually see). The dress is fully lined with the softest 100% cotton and all seams are professionally finished for durability. The dresses have button closures for easy access and no fear of catching little skin in the teeth of zippers.

This little cotton dress is comfortable and easy to wear making it perfect for everyday trips to the park or lazy afternoons at home while also being darling enough for brunch with the grandparents or tea with the aunties. It would even be cute with little tights and a cardigan or thrown over a long sleeve top for chillier days. And when you're finished just throw it in the laundry however you like, no fuss needed.

● Coordinating bottoms ● 
Coordinating bottoms are available to complete the outfit for the discounted rate of 5$ when purchased with a dress. Simply go to the “bottoms” tab and select “coordinating bottoms" Picture of bottoms may be included but SOLD SEPARATELY.

● Sizing ● 
The dresses are available in the following custom sizes: 
0-3 months (chest 20" waist 18") –1 button 
3-6 months (chest 21" waist 19") –1 button 
6-12 months (chest 22" waist 20") –1 button 
12-24 months (chest 23" waist 21") –3 buttons 
2T (chest 24" waist 22") –3 buttons 
3T (chest 25" waist 22.5") –3 buttons

The waist measurements are unstretched elastic. If you prefer a different measurement for the size you order just let me know when you check out.

● Shipping ● 
Please allow 1-2 weeks for your order to be custom made before shipment.

All my items come tied with a bow, if you would like to include a little gift note just let me know when you check out.

name: Brick and Blue - Joel Jumper
description:
Joel Jumper -Blue and Brick

Introducing the adorable Joel Jumper with pleat detailing at the neck , darling tab detailing at the shoulders, and cute little pocket at the side. The jumpers have button closures for easy access and no fear of catching little skin in the teeth of zippers. They made out of the softest cotton fabric and are completed with snaps at the crotch for easy diaper changes


Sizing:
The dresses are available in the following custom sizes:
0-3 months (chest 20" hips 24") –1 button
3-6 months (chest 21" waist 25") –1 button
6-12 months (chest 22" waist 26") –1 button
12-24 months (chest 23" waist 27") –3 buttons
2T (chest 24" waist 28") –3 buttons

Please allow 1-2 weeks for your order to be custom made before shipment. 

If you would like to upgrade shipping to priority (5.25$ US -includes delivery confirmation, 9$ canada, 11$ everywhere else) please let me know.

Joel jumpers can be made to coordinate any peek-a-boo dress. Also if there is a fabric selection that you would like in a Joel jumper convo me and I will make one available.

Please indicate size when you check out.

All my items come tied with a bow, if you would like to include a little gift note just let me know in the messages to sellers when you check out.
